game.name: No Place Like Home
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Humanity Trashed the Earth and left for Mars. Only few remained. EXPLORE the world. Clean the environment, CRAFT with recycled resources. Domesticate animals. Rebuild your village. Restore environment and run your own post-apo FARM as there is No Place Like Home!
